post:
VEEBLE (www.veeble.org)


Flexible enterprise SSD cloud in minutes! Veeble Cloud features:

»100% Uptime
We deliver 100% availability of hardware and network.

»Instant Scaling
Scale your resources up and down on demand by exactly the components you need.

»Free Auto Backups
Free secure Snapshot auto backups stored in dedicated NAS arrays.

»Linux & Windows Operating Systems
You can deploy VPS with both Linux and Windows Operating Systems readily available in the control panel.

»Blazing Fast SSD Storage
Enterprise Flash cached SSD Arrays with datacenter grade SSD ensure performance and rock solid reliability for our Storage.

»Fastest Processors
True server grade Intel Xeon E5 v2 Processors ensure stable, predictable performance with no CPU limits or throttles.

»Multiple Locations
We deliver Cloud platforms in the EU, USA, Asia & Australia.

»Free Server Management
We provide free full server management if the Cloud is ordered with Cpanel.



Start building your Cloud VPS from here : http://www.veeble.org/vps/cloud/
